div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1121 Olbia (mod. Parutino), Ochakov raion, Nikolaev oblast, Ukraine, 1959 Burial: c. 200-150 B.C. Contents: 1 AR, 128 AE. In one room Olbia: 1 dr. (as AMNG I.1, pl. 10, 23) 125 AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 4 [2], 5 [2], 7 [5], 8 [3], 10-11 [2], 12 [1], 13 [1], 16 [2], 20 [1], 22 [2], 23 [6], 26-29 [61], 30-31 [6]; pl. 10, 1 [4], 2 [6], 3 [2], 5 [3], 6 [1], 8 [2], 13 [8], 15-17 [2], 28 [1]; unc. [2]) Panticapaeum: 3 AE (as BMC 20 [1], 21 [2]) Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
